text:
I'm pretty sure you need lib/optional.jar for the built-in style task, otherwise 
you will get undefined class errors for TraxLiason or XalanLiaison.

The documentation for ant should state this.  Probably both installation and 
"Library Dependencies" at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/ant/manual/install.html#librarydependencies should 
mention this.

(I filed a separate bug that the default jakarta-ant-1.3-bin.tar.gz distribution 
doesn't include lib/optional.jar.)
creator: spage@macromedia.com
